title: Household details page
description: Create apps/web/src/routes/_authenticated/household.tsx inside the app shell (protected by auth + household guard). Displays: (1) Editable household name -- click heading to switch to Input + save/cancel Buttons, uses useMutation(api.households.updateHousehold), validates non-empty and max 100 chars. (2) Member list from useQuery(api.households.getHouseholdMembers, {householdId}) -- each row shows Avatar with AvatarImage/AvatarFallback (initials), name or email, and '(You)' indicator for current user. (3) Separator between sections. (4) 'Change Household' Button (variant=destructive or outline) that opens AlertDialog with title 'Leave Household?' and dynamic description (warns if last member, household will be deleted based on members.length === 1). AlertDialog has Cancel and 'Leave & Continue' buttons. On confirm: call leaveHousehold mutation, navigate to /onboarding. All data reactive via Convex subscriptions. Covers FR-16 through FR-20, NFR-03, NFR-05 through NFR-07.
